popular-movies.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his ...

popular-movies.title: Stranger Things: The sound of the Upside Down
popular-movies.description: The antsy bingers of Netflix will eagerly anticipate the digital release of the Survive soundtrack, out today.

popular-movies.title: Iron Man
popular-movies.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movielist.title: Doctor Strange: Multiverse of Madness
movielist.description: Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl from his dreams who can travel across multiverses, to battle multiple threats, including other-universe versions of himself, which threaten to wipe out millions across the multiverse. They seek help from Wanda the Scarlet Witch, Wong and others.

movielist.title: Deadpool
movielist.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal yet hideously scarred, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.
